attributes.action: Increase accessibility to sports facilities and promote healthy lifestyles
attributes.additional_details: Government has the most power and influence across the UK. This means that change at a local level can be done more efficiently.
attributes.background:
Build more sports facilities e.g. football pitches 
Decrease the prices to access these facilities
Promote leading healthy lifestyles e.g. eating healthy and exercise

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
